price: 50. В ilamba bia bango bikozalaka nde mbiko(1) mpe moto mokozingaka bilongi bia bango.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
